member.name: T:JsonCons.JsonPathLib.JsonPath
member.remarks: A JsonPath object may own references to some objects. It should be disposed to ensure that these objects are properly disposed.

member.name: M:JsonCons.JsonPathLib.JsonPath.SelectPaths(System.Text.Json.JsonElement,JsonCons.JsonPathLib.ResultOptions)
member.summary: Selects paths to elements in root that match the JSONPath expression.
member.returns: A list of paths to elements in root that match the provided JSONPath expression
